rukus.text: O vi messengers mangx bon provisions work righteousness! Mi est fully aware da cxio vi do
Such est your congregation - 1 congregation - Mi est your Lord vi reverence Me
Ili larm into disput factions; each parti felicx ki ili hav
Do just las them their confusion por awhile
Do ili opini ekde ni proviz them mon infan
Ni dusx them blessings? Ja ili ne hav ide
Surely those est reverently conscious de their Lord
who kred en revelations their Lord
Kaj who neniam set any idols their Lord
As ili don their charities their kor est fully reverent. Ili recognize ti ili summoned their Lord
Ili est eager do righteous works ili kondur en doing them
Ni neniam sxargx any anim its means ni keep record utters truth. Ne 1 sufer injustice
their mens est oblivious al this ili commit works do ne conform this; their works est evil
Tiam when ni requite their estr retribution ili plend
Ne plend nun; vi don all help el us
My proofs prezent vi vi torn your kalkan
Vi est tro arrogant akcept them vi defiantly disregarded them
Why ili ne reflect this scripture? Ili ne realize ke ili Do ricev io hav neniam ating their ancestors
Ili failed recognize their messenger? this ili est disregarding him
Ili decid ke li hav est crazy Ja li brought truth them plej de them hate truth
Ja se truth conformed their wishes tie est chaos heavens ter; cxio them corrupted Ni don them their proof ili disregarding their proof
Vi pet them wage Your Lord's wage est far put. Li est put Provider
plej assuredly vi invit them rekt path
Those disbelieve Hereafter surely deviate dekstr path
Eben when ni dusx them kun mercy, relieved their problem ili plongx profund transgression ad blunder
Ecx when ni aflikt them retribution ili neniam torn their Lord imploring
Subsequently when ni requited them severe retribution ili incurred ili shocked
